messages.content: It’s 79 years since the Battle of Britain, fought to defend our nation from an authoritarian foreign power. This time we face not only the EU but our own political class who compliantly implement the will of Brussels not the people. The EU is not about trade. It’s about political domination.

Johnson’s EU-UK Withdrawal Agreement is 535 pages of UK commitments in return for nothing. This is not freedom, democracy, sovereignty and taking back control that we voted for but a Treaty of Vassalage and continued payments.
LibDems and Labour have no intention of honoring the Referendum, openly showing their contempt for democracy.

messages.title: Vote UKIP
messages.content: to send our treacherous liar politicians a message they will never forget. Vote for Troy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for a Brexit with no lingering commitments to the EU.
Calls for a stop to large numbers of immigrants entering the UK.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Put our NHS before Foreign Aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritize National Health Service funding over international aid.
Suggests removing dishonest politicians from office.
Calls for the elimination of the television licence fee which funds the BBC.
Advocate for the UK to have full control over its laws and regulations.
Promote the protection of traditional British values and the right to free speech.

issues.brexitEurope: Calls for a 'Clean-Break Brexit'. Refers to the current Brexit deal as a 'Treaty of Vassalage.'
issues.governance: Promises to 'Sack Liar Politicians' and shows disdain for the current political class.
issues.health: Wants to prioritize NHS funding over foreign aid.

contactInformation.address: Office of Troy de Leon, both of 12 Crockenden Close, Woking, Surrey GU22 0DY
